biotools.summary: ZiFiT (Zinc Finger Targeter) assists in the design of zinc finger proteins that can bind to specific DNA sequences. ZiFiT has been updated to integrate additional tools and resources including scoring schemes for modular assembly, an interface with the Zinc Finger Database of engineered ZFPs, and direct query of NCBI BLAST servers for identification of potential off-target sites within a host genome.
